actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 p.m. on April 29, 2024.

actions-list.header: ADJUSTMENT OF THE WHOLE NUMBER OF THE HOUSE
actions-list.actionItem: Under clause 5(d) of Rule XX, the Chair announced to the House that, in light of the passing of the gentleman from New Jersey, Mr. Payne, the whole number of the House is 429.

actions-list.header: Select Committee on the Strategic Competition Between the United States and the Chinese Communist Party
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to section 1(a)(2)(A) of House Resolution 11, 118th Congress, as amended by section 1(b) of House Resolution 78, 118th Congress, and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed: Mr. Moolenaar, Chair.

actions-list.header: ADJUSTMENT OF THE WHOLE NUMBER OF THE HOUSE
actions-list.actionItem: Under clause 5(d) of Rule XX, the Chair announced to the House that, in light of the resignation of the gentleman from Wisconsin, Mr. Gallagher, the whole number of the House is 430.
The House received a communication from Representative Gallagher wherein he resigns as a member of the House of Representatives effective at 5:00 p.m. on April 24, 2024.

The House received a message from the Acting Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Acting Clerk received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on April 25, 2024, at 10:30 a.m.: That the Senate passed S. 2143, S. 2717, S. 2274, S. 3267, S. 3357, S. 3419, S. 3639, S. 3640, S. 3851, H.R. 292, H.R. 996, H.R. 2379, H.R. 2754, H.R. 3947, H.R. 3865, and H.R. 3944.

The House received a message from the Acting Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Acting Clerk received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on April 23, 2024, at 9:45 p.m.: That the Senate agreed to the House amendment to the Senate amendment to H.R. 815.

The House received a message from the Acting Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Acting Clerk received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on April 23, 2024, at 2:03 p.m.: That the Senate passed S. 3687 and S. 3998. Appointment: United States Semiquincentennial Commission.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Adrian Smith to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
